statements: SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT trial_id, study_name, treatment_type FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT patient_id, study_name FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE treatment_type='Drug';
SELECT patient_id, trial_start_date, trial_end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE study_name='Cancer Study' ORDER BY trial_start_date ASC;
SELECT trial_id, study_name, trial_start_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE treatment_type = 'Chemotherapy' ORDER BY trial_start_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE trial_end_date > '2023-01-01' AND treatment_type = 'Surgery' ORDER BY trial_end_date ASC
SELECT patient_id, trial_start_date, trial_end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE study_name LIKE '%diabetes%'
SELECT trial_id, patient_id, treatment_type FROM clinical_trials WHERE trial_start_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY patient_id, trial_start_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT DISTINCT study_name FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY study_name ASC
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, research_site FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, end_date FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_studies WHERE study_name = 'Cancer Study';
SELECT study_id, patient_id, treatment_option FROM research_studies WHERE patient_id = 101;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, start_date, end_date, research_site FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE research_site='Hospital A';
SELECT trial_name, research_site FROM clinical_trials WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY trial_name;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT study_id, study_name, patient_id, treatment_option FROM research_studies ORDER BY study_id DESC, patient_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT trial_id, study_name, patient_id, treatment_option, start_date FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT study_name, patient_id, start_date FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE treatment_option IS NOT NULL;
SELECT study_name, patient_id, treatment_option FROM clinical_trials WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT study_name, treatment_option FROM clinical_trials WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT study_name, researcher_name, research_area FROM research_studies;
SELECT trial_id, study_name, patient_id FROM clinical_trials WHERE treatment_option IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials;
SELECT patient_id, study_name, enrollment_date FROM ClinicalTrials;
SELECT study_name, lead_researcher, start_date FROM ResearchStudies;
SELECT patient_name, dob, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_name, treatment_date FROM Treatments;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials;
SELECT study_name, patient_id FROM ClinicalTrials ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT study_name, enrollment_date FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id;

SELECT ResearchStudies.study_name, Patients.patient_name, Treatments.treatment_name FROM ResearchStudies JOIN Patients ON ResearchStudies.study_name = Patients.patient_name JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 40;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM trials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, dosage, side_effects FROM treatments WHERE dosage BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT researcher_name, specialization, email FROM researchers WHERE specialization = 'Oncology';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM trials WHERE estimated_duration > 30;
SELECT treatment_name, dosage, side_effects, efficacy FROM treatments WHERE dosage >= 100;
SELECT study_name, researcher_name, start_date, end_date FROM studies WHERE researcher_id = 1;
